title: Would like some help
content:
Hi there!  
Hope that someone can help me with identifying these fonts. If chocolate is the font insolente then maybe someone has an alternative for a free font. Thanks a lot and have a great day!  
Liel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020220936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font1_6112.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020220936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_5753.jpg)
author: Lililoo123

comments.content: could be many things. try Kaleko 105, or maybe Typograph Pro.
Thanks a lot for your help. Will try those!
Chocolate is hand written, you can tell from the two unique O's
Thanks a lot. Really appreciate you all helping me out! Will check the alternatives for chocolate now and Sara's hand is the right one for captured!
